cause.description:
IBD (inflamatory Bowel Disease) is split into to parts Chron's disease and Colitis. Anybody can get it however it is most common with teens. If you would like to learn more go to www.ccfa.org
1. IBD is most common with teenagers
2. IBD use to be called the Eisenhower disease because President Eisenhower was the first to have it
cause.mission: support those suffering by spreading the word
